definitions: a typically large weevil that feeds on various grasses and grains.

notes.text: Genus Sphenophorus, subfamily Rhynchophorinae, family Curculionidae: numerous species, including the maize billbug (S. maidis), which can cause serious damage to corn plants and can harm or kill poultry by clamping onto the bird's throat or tongue

shortDefinitions: large weevil that feeds on various grasses
